name: Phantasos, the Dream Mirror Foe
effectText: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Dream Mirror" monster: This card can attack directly this turn. During the Main or Battle Phase, if "Dream Mirror of Joy" is in a Field Zone (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Phantasos, the Dream Mirror Friend" from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Phantasos, the Dream Mirror Foe" once per turn.
